verses.roman:
saṅketa-veṇu-nāde rādhā āni' kuñja-ghare
kuñjere calilā kṛṣṇa krīḍā karibāre

synonyms: saṅketa-veṇu-nāde—by the signal of the vibration of the flute; rādhā—Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī; āni'-bringing; kuñja-ghare—to a bower; kuñjere—within the bower; calilā—went; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; krīḍā karibāre—to perform pastimes.
translation: "He brought Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī to a bower by signaling with His flute. Then He entered within that bower to perform pastimes with Her.
